In this paragraph, the only chemical entity mentioned is "systolic blood pressure (BP)". It is important to note that "systolic blood pressure" is a measurement of the pressure in the arteries when the heart beats and pumps blood out. It is not a specific chemical compound, but it is a crucial parameter in medical research and clinical practice.
